item.title: Algorithms -- Recursion
item.author: Author
item.description: Ideas Recursion What important is, NEVER JUMP INTO RECURSION. Actually… If it’s possible, you can jump into it… (Well… You can take a try:) ) In a Word, what the Blog above says, is that you must make sure that you know the very Defination of your Recursion Function, and trust that it can finish its Work perfectly. 1. Recursion in List Figure out what does your Function proceedure with, what kind of value will it return.
